channel.title: Need help please, no one else can get on my server
channel.description: Only I can connect to my server through local host,my freinds cannot connect through the ip, i did the no ip thing and downloaded the no-ip.duc

item.title: Need help please, no one else can get on my server
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

If you want to have a no-ip then you have to Portforward: http://www.portforward.com[br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2007, 11:36:18 PM[/size][hr]Full TuT on Hamachi:
Once you got it Downloaded open it… Press the Connect Button, once you got that, a Screen should pop up asking you for a Name, anter your Name, that will show up on screen. Click ok. Click on either the Circle or other shape in the corner. Pick New Network… Enter your Network Name (EG:StarzScape, Owner of StarzScape) Of course, change the Starzscape to yours Now people have to join your hamachi, they have to have Hamachi ALSO They click on the circle or other shape, and press Join existing Network, if you were to type StArZsCaPe then they have to spell it EXACTLY same, if they dont do that, it wont work. Give them the password to join the Network. Once they got that, start up your Server, and there will be a IP next to your Hamachi Name, this is what your Friends need to use on Mopar. They have to enter YOUR IP into Server IP: And they should be able to Connect … Have Fun!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help please, no one else can get on my server

item.title: Need help please, no one else can get on my server
item.dc:creator: @Cyclops72 Cyclops72
item.description:
@Cyclops72 wrote:

Download Hamachi, Idk where though Find it somewhere

Then you look at the big ip on top and thats your ip that people are oging to connect

Then you create a network any kind and make a pss too

Other people can join your server by joining in your network and looking at you ip, the ip you have is on top it’s big and white so put that as a hamachi ip when posting youir thread so other people know what ip to connect to, and then if you haev a port then you put the port in on mopparscape and copy the ip from hamachi and paste it by clicking on file new server ip and press ctrl+v to paste it, your done
